label: Infected
desc:
Case data is extracted daily at 4 AM from the Norwegian Surveillance System for Communicable Diseases (MSIS) web interface. Municipalities and districts in MSIS are automatically mapped to current municipalities (kommuner) and districts (bydeler) based on Statistics Norway`s (SSB) classifications. Note that district cases for Oslo and Bergen often sum to a slightly lower number of cases than the respective municipality cases. To report cases at the most granular level, the difference is mapped to "Ukjent bydel"("Unknown district") for Bergen and Oslo.

Attribution: Meldingssystem for smittsomme sykdommer, Nasjonalt folkehelseinstitt

label: Admissions
desc: Admission data is based on the following Power BI Dashboard) maintained by the Norwegian Directorate of Health. This is the number of people in hospital (inpatient stay) with confirmed Covid-19 at the given date.

label: In respirator
desc: Admission data is based on the following Power BI Dashboard) maintained by the Norwegian Directorate of Health. This is the number of people in hospital with confirmed Covid-19 receiving respiratory intensive care at the given date.

label: Covid tests
desc: Test figures are extracted from the National Institute of Health`s (FHI) daily PDF-reports.

label: Google Mobility
desc: Based on Google's COVID 19 Community Mobility Reports which are being released weekly.

label: Apple Mobility
desc: Based on Apples's COVID 19 Mobility Trends Reports which are being released weekly.

label: Unemployment benefits
desc: Temporary layoff data is available from Norwegian Labour and Welfare Administration (NAV). Data is reported at the weekly level, but updated daily
